data.message: I have problems with a rapper B-Tight he is telepathically bullying me since August 2015, since December 2015 I am in a clinic because I no longer knows where. He is beating me, insulting me, threatening me, humiliating, humiliating, mocking, pain, the carers think I am schizophrenia. Now I live in a supervised living. Please help me. He tyrannizes me with his gang telepathically. Please help me I believe he kills me. Femi
